String.string: Use the cannon and save our candy!
Here they come to steal our candy! You can move skill slots around!
Save more candy for a better score! Score well for a Halloween treat!
Thank you for saving our candy basket!
I will send your reward by mail.
As Gourdo vanishes, a chill fills the party hall.
A Halloween spirit played a trick!
Boo! Gourdo approaches! Killing Gourdo will slow candy thieves down!
Use both mouse buttons to fire pumpkins. A right-click applies a strong damage over time effect. They're coming in 3...
The first pumpkin will stun. The second will slow, Both can be fired every 25 seconds. (2)
The third pumpkin is truly powerful, and can only be fired once every 40 seconds. (1)
